class.name: GDScriptClassAnnotation
class.brief_description: A user annotation that can only target classes.
class.description: A user annotation that can only target classes.

method.name: _analyze
method.description: Override to access the targeted class's information. - [param name] is the class's name.

method.name: _get_allow_multiple
method.description: Override to specify if there can be multiple instances of this annotation on the same target. If not overridden, the default is [code]false[/code].
